competitors.name: Blue Prism
competitors.notes: UK-based RPA pioneer, coined the term 'robotic process automation'

competitors.name: Automation Anywhere
competitors.notes: Established RPA vendor with enterprise focus

competitors.name: Pegasystems
competitors.notes: BPM with emerging robotic automation capabilities

competitors.name: WorkFusion
competitors.notes: Intelligent automation combining ML and RPA

context: In 2015, UiPath was a small Romanian company (originally DeskOver) pivoting to RPA. Blue Prism and Automation Anywhere were the established RPA leaders. The RPA market was nascent but growing as enterprises sought automation for repetitive tasks. UiPath launched its RPA platform and began its growth trajectory that would make it a market leader. Gartner had not yet created a Magic Quadrant for RPA (first published 2018).
